name: d43-catalog
description: Lambda functions for handling the Door43 Catalog

hooks.build: pip install --upgrade -r ../../requirements.txt -t . && cp -r ../../tools . && pip install --upgrade -r tools/requirements.txt -t .
hooks.clean: pip uninstall -r tools/requirements.txt -t . && rm -rf tools && pip uninstall -r ../../requirements.txt -t .
